body:
<!--StartFragment-->

Though she prefers to be called Maguy Abiba, Abiba Aruna Maguy is a "muslim-turned-christian" missionary.\
\
Born in Kalima (DR Congo), the 38-year old has committed to worshipping and praising God, contrary to her background. This is to say her background can't put her back on the ground.

>  When asked why the swap, she said,"...because worship and praising God is my lifestyle...the Holy Spirit is my inspiration"

\
Maguy Abiba has two songs to her name: "Yes" and "Mama Africa".\
\
Despite her zeal, the artist cannot ignore financial constraints. But she's still pressing on.\
\
When Maguy is not planning on going global with her art, she takes care of her darling husband and their child.

<!--EndFragment-->
author: dIyA2l79NifO81mlNIh6t
slug: When asked why the swap, she said,"...because worship and praising God is my lifestyle...the Holy Spirit is my inspiration"
seo_title: Artist Profile: Meet Muslim worshiper, ABIBA!
